game.name: Puppy Park
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 음량 개별 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Run your very own Puppy Park — a tiny dog hotel for pups of every breed and personality! Feed yummy snacks, pamper with grooming, and embark on adventures just for them. Earn their love, grow your reputation, and fill your hotel with wagging tails and happy barks! Play daily in bite-sized chunks!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Run your very own Puppy Park — a tiny dog hotel for pups of every breed and personality! Feed yummy snacks, pamper with grooming, and embark on adventures just for them. Earn their love, grow your reputation, and fill your hotel with wagging tails and happy barks! Play daily in bite-sized chunks!
